A quick question for the group: if you go metal-on-metal with two swords of
equal hardness, how do you repair the notches in the blade edge?

Up until now, I have only been involved with broadsword-style swords, and am
new to what I am rapidly realizing is the vastly different world of Japanese
swords. It would seem near impossible to repair the notches in the hardened
edges of such blades.

Am I missing something?

Many Thanks,

--Louis
